Winston-Salem.Forsyth County Courthouse: Forsyth County Courthouse is a historic county courthouse located at Winston-Salem, Forsyth County, North Carolina. It was built in 1926, and is a three-story, limestone clad, Beaux-Arts style building that incorporates interior elements of the earlier 1896 Romanesque Revival style courthouse. Between 1959 and 1960, additions were built onto the front and rear.
